name: Midnight Realm
description:
Players 4-5

Set in the mysterious world of the Midnight Realm where ghouls and goblins roam the lands. A group of heroes set off with  the goal of vanquishing the Death Priest who holds control over the realm. Using both teamwork and strategy will they be able to prevail against the Priest, or will the realm remain under his control...

[https://playingcards.io/xpt9up]
